title: World Class De-Forestation
abstract: News story covering effects of the de-forestation in East Gippsland
description: A look at the damaging effects of the de-forestation occurring in the East Gippsland forest ranges and the efforts of a group of activists to stop it. Produced as a news story for SKA TV's Access News, a grass-roots alternative to mainstream news and current affairs, broadcast weekly on Melbourne's Community Television station Channel 31 since 1994.
